Title: The Ruins of Guo-Lai
Description:
The villagers seem to be safe and the mogu are losing their foothold. We should be able to handle the rest from here. Thank you for your kind aid, $n.

Anji lead a group to investigate and clear out the Ruins of Guo-Lai to the northwest this morning. I am certain she would appreciate someone as capable as yourself. You should go to her.
